TopicTitle: Radio Satellites and Broadcasting Capability (Music to Kerbals Ears)

Articles.Content:
As a user of KSP for about 4 months now I am becoming quiet proficient in knowing which of the 4/5 soundtracks is going to come on next, I thought it would be a good idea to include parts that link to an MP3 directly so we can build radio satellites and broadcast our own music across the Kerbal Universe.

As mentioned I must say I do like the music already in KSP, however playing "ride of the valkyrie" whilst launching a Kerbal drop ship or "2001 space odyssey" whilst putting a kerbal on a trajectory into the sun would be just as entertaining as creating a night club station on Minmus for Kerbal's to show of their head-banging, body popping, and interstellar mind-warping dance moves to something like Chase and status or Slayer (depending on your own choice of music).

I'll also admit that i am an ex soldier and have absolutely no idea how to code or design mods/plug-ins for computer programs, If somebody would like to pick this idea up and develop it themselves then feel free, just send a little credit my way for the initial idea.

Any thoughts???
